Basketball is a team sport in which two teams, most commonly of five players each, opposing one another on a rectangular court, compete with the primary objective of shooting a basketball (approximately 9.4 inches (24 cm) in diameter) through the defender's hoop (a basket 18 inches (46 cm) in diameter mounted 10 feet (3.048 m) high to a backboard at each end of the court), while preventing the opposing team from shooting through their own hoop. A field goal is worth two points, unless made from behind the three-point line, when it is worth three. After a foul, timed play stops and the player fouled or designated to shoot a technical foul is given one, two or three one-point free throws. The team with the most points at the end of the game wins, but if regulation play expires with the score tied, an additional period of play (overtime) is mandated.

The sea, a vast and endless expanse,
Where waves dance in a rhythmic trance,
Beneath the open, boundless sky,
With seagulls soaring, way up high.

The sea, a vast and endless expanse,
Where waves dance in a rhythmic trance,
Beneath the open, boundless sky,
With seagulls soaring, way up high.

Its colors change, from azure to deep blue,
Reflecting the skies, in every hue,
A canvas painted by nature's hand,
A masterpiece across the land.

The waves, they sing a soothing song,
As they gently caress the shore along,
A lullaby of peace and grace,
In this tranquil, boundless space.

Beneath the surface, a world unknown,
With mysteries in its depths are sown,
Coral gardens and creatures rare,
In the sea's embrace, they're everywhere.

And as the sun sets on the horizon's line,
The sea reflects colors, divine,
A fiery orange and shades of gold,
A sight to treasure, a story untold.

The sea, a wonder, both wild and serene,
A place where dreams and memories convene,
It whispers secrets of the ancient deep,
A timeless love, the ocean's keep.

The first day of junior high school, or "middle school" as it's often called, is a day filled with excitement and a touch of nervousness. It marks the beginning of a new chapter in a student's academic journey.

Paper flowers are an exquisite form of art that captivates with their delicate and ephemeral beauty. Crafted with precision and creativity, these intricate blossoms hold a unique charm. Each petal meticulously cut, folded, and shaped, they seem to defy the fragility of paper.

These creations serve as an enduring symbol of artistry and ingenuity. They adorn events and celebrations, bringing a touch of elegance and charm to any setting. Paper flowers are a testament to the power of human creativity and the ability to capture the essence of natural beauty in an everlasting, delicate form.

The beauty of reflection is a mesmerizing phenomenon that often goes unnoticed in our fast-paced lives.
